author: Jayme Petracci
title: The best overall service
content: If you need a more complex example such as having buttons and dots/thumbnails, check out my other tutorial: How to Create a Carousel in NextJS using TailwindCSS and EmblaCarousel. It covers a more in-depth explanation of the implementation.
